document_data.mainbody:
rondsgrunn was a region of the island of Norland within the Moonshae Isles that was controlled by giants.
Grondsgrunn was found in the southern region of Norland where the South Jotunhammer Mountains were located. As of the , the giant-controlled territory ended at the unnamed pass that separated the South Jotunhammer Mountains from the North Jotunhammer Mountains.
* Sordal
* Sommersdal
* Follebu
